Html: What property (in which event) enables me to view the contents of the datagrid cell being edited? My datagrid is bound to a data table and I know how to push the cell to the table before RowEditEnding but I how do I see the new data/cell contents before it is written to the data table?
I use ((cell.Content as TextBox).Text. Don't sure that there is good way, but it works for me.
